mapper.select: SELECT f.name, f.img, count(d.feeling_id) as frequency FROM feeling f LEFT JOIN Diary d ON f.id = d.feeling_id AND d.member_id = 1 group by f.name ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT f.name, f.bigimg, count(d.feeling_id) as frequency, f.description FROM feeling f inner JOIN Diary d ON f.id = d.feeling_id AND d.member_id = 1 group by f.name ORDER BY frequency DESC limit 1

SELECT f.img, f.name, COUNT(d.feeling_id) as frequency, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(d.feeling_id) DESC) as ranking FROM Diary d INNER JOIN feeling f ON f.id = d.feeling_id WHERE d.member_id = 1 GROUP BY f.id ORDER BY frequency DESC LIMIT 1,4;
